context_bundle.summary: Markdown extended syntax with MDX for React components, documentation best practices, and advanced formatting

common_patterns: Headers: '# H1\n## H2\n### H3' for hierarchy

Lists: '- Item 1
- Item 2
  - Nested' for unordered, '1. First
2. Second' for ordered
Code blocks: '```language\ncode here\n```' with syntax highlighting
Task lists: '- [x] Completed\n- [ ] Todo' for checkboxes
MDX: 'import Component from "./Component"; <Component prop="value" /> in .mdx files'
known_errors: rendering issues: Check markdown parser, ensure proper escaping
MDX not working: Install @mdx-js/loader, configure webpack/next.js
syntax highlighting: Add language to code blocks, install prism/highlight.js
table not rendering: Ensure pipes aligned, check parser supports tables
component not found: Check import paths in MDX, ensure components exported
frontmatter not parsed: Install gray-matter, configure markdown processor
